text:
*<!everyone>* happy friday folks! a few quick things for you:
• we're hosting an AMA next week with the founding team at <https://meetharlow.com/features/|Harlow>, Samantha Anderl and Andrea Wildt. Harlow is a tool to help freelancers run their business and it includes features for project management, invoicing, templates, time tracking and more. In this AMA, we'll be talking all about growing and managing a successful freelance business. this is happening next wednesday at 1pm ET in the <#C014P2BJLER|ask-me-anything> channel. <https://calndr.link/event/NkVG3W5a2v|you can add this to your calendar here>.
• for Pro members: we have our Feb office hours with <@UKSSGHC8P> this afternoon. you should have a calendar invite already :tada:
• i want to give a shout out to <@U01T1J6KJL8>. she's been helping me a lot of behind-the-scenes work for the last few months and is moving on to a really exciting new role. thank you for everything <@U01T1J6KJL8>!
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---

:v: jimmy
